I'm very new at this, Another team at my work place has been using this Httpunit/junit for testing their app. Our management decided to use the same framework they had and when i was trying to create xml flows i was not able to get past these pages as junit/http unit could not set focus on the pop up windows and when i contacted the other team they told me that functionality had not ben built into the framework. So i was not sure if we could handle pop up windows and page refreshed. I would really appreciate if you could let me know how its done. And thanks for your quick response.

"J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@...> wrote:bkhambadkone wrote:

> I'm testing an application which has a lot of Pop up windows and the
> pages refresh on selecting certain things from drop down lists, How
> can i handle these in junit.

Certainly. What have you tried so far? What problems have you run into?
--
